## ðŸš€ What is doris-sql-convertor?


> Doris SQL Convertor is a dedicated Doris SQL Converter that allows seamless switching of multi-source SQL dialects to Doris, achieving smooth business migration.


## ðŸ”¨ How to Use

```shell
vim config.conf
sh bin/start.sh
sh bin/stop.sh
```
